alert.note: Alert for Hansford; Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:21PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Texas, Hansford and Ochiltree Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 520 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Goodwell to 11 miles southeast of Waka. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Perryton, Spearman, Gruver, Optima, Hardesty, Farnsworth and Waka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
